ICML.CH

A fully independent project: a clean, searchable website built from scratch, covering both frontend templates and backend integration with Magnolia CMS.

Detailed scope of the project

ICML was my first end-to-end solo project, encompassing every layer of development, with occasional support from a colleague. The objective was to create a simple yet fully functional website with content management and search capabilities. I designed and implemented custom HTML, CSS, and JavaScript templates for the frontend, while configuring Magnolia CMS as the backend to handle content authoring, page structuring, and full-text search. The site demonstrates a complete workflow—from content creation in the CMS to dynamic rendering and user-facing search—serving as a practical proof of concept for lightweight, maintainable web solutions.

Technologies used

  • Magnolia CMS
  • Freemarker (templating), HTML, CSS, Javascript
  • JCR (Java Content Repository)
